description: Basic Rabbitize demonstration - navigate to a website, take a screenshot, extract content

cells.name: start_browser
cells.instructions: Start a browser session and navigate to {{ input.url }}. Look at the initial screenshot and describe what you see.

cells.name: explore_page
cells.instructions: Now extract the page content to see what's available. Describe the key elements you find.

cells.name: explore_page_more
cells.instructions: Move the mouse cursor and click on something to navigate to another page. The browser window is 1920x1080 for reference, so please extrapolate from what resized image you may have.

rules.turn_prompt:
### Did this action do what you expected it to? Did the cursor move to where you expected?
 (this us {{ turn }} of {{ max_turns }} turns in this phase)

cells.name: close_browser
cells.instructions: Close the browser session and report what you learned.
